intro: This is a shared space where you will get the chance to feel seen and be heard.
title: Be responsible
text: Each individual is responsible for their own behavior. We expect them to follow these principles, and to let others know when they violate these principles.

title: Hold space
text:
This is not a discussion forum, but a place for people to share, reflect, and be afforded the space to be vulnerable without fear of being judged.

Resist the urge to give advice or to attempt to fix their problems. Instead, simply hold that space for them to get their thoughts and feelings off their chest.

title: Donâ€™t get personal
text:
Although the stories you share may be deeply personal, avoid revealing any personally identifiable information such as names, phone numbers and addresses.

Given the open nature of the course channel, there is no guarantee that such information is not misused.
